org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.data
Interface UpdateableXYDataset

All Superinterfaces:
org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable, XYDataset
All Known Subinterfaces:
AppendableXYDataset, RangeMutableXYDataset
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractUpdateableArrayXYDataset, AppendableArrayXYDataset
public interface UpdateableXYDataset
extends XYDataset

This interface must be implemented by any dataset implementation that expects modifications to occur. It imposes a contract on modifications, in that all modifications must occur between calls to beginUpdate() and endUpdate()

Method Summary
 void addXYDatasetListener(XYDatasetListener dataListener)
          Add a XYDatasetListener to this dataset.
 void beginUpdate()
          Prepare this dataset for modification.
 void endUpdate()
          Updates and optimizes the underlying datastructure after a series of modifications.
 void removeXYDatasetListener(XYDatasetListener dataListener)

Methods inherited from interface org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.XYDataset
getAxisId, getIdentifier, getNumSamples, getNumSamples, getRangeBottom, getRangeLabel, getRangeTop, getX, getX, getY, getY
 

Method Detail

addXYDatasetListener

void addXYDatasetListener(XYDatasetListener dataListener)
Add a XYDatasetListener to this dataset. Listeners are called after execute of endUpdate() if there were any modificatons

beginUpdate

void beginUpdate()
Prepare this dataset for modification. Must be called before setXY, removeXY or insertXY methods.

endUpdate

void endUpdate()
Updates and optimizes the underlying datastructure after a series of modifications. Must be called after beginUpdate()

removeXYDatasetListener

void removeXYDatasetListener(XYDatasetListener dataListener)
Remove a XYDatasetListener from this dataset.
